Will you please carry that home with you, and read and search and find out about the breach, because every one of you want to become intelligent in faith and doctrine, that you may "give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you." Let us seek the Lord that we may find Him. He wants us to seek Him. God help us to come right to the point, and 


                                    -47- 

every one of us be employed in lifting up the Sabbath which has been trampled under the feet of man, and a spurious one put in its place.
